attributes.action: punish any members of parliament that stole tax payers money in "expenses" to face criminal charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if a member of the public was to steal money or not pay taxes we would be investigated immediately. Why should MP's get away with doing the same?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
